shootTypes.title: What types of sessions can I host?

photoshoots.title: Recording Sessions
photoshoots.description: Recording sessions are straightforward and low impact. They typically last a few hours and include a small team of less than 10 people.

commercials.title: Production Projects
commercials.description: Production projects come in all shapes and sizes. On average, they last about a day and require a team of 10-20 people.

filmShoots.title: Long-term Productions
filmShoots.description: Big budget productions run over multiple days and require larger teams. They also pay the best and give you the best chance to work with top professionals.

howItWorks.title: How Studioz Works in 3 Simple Steps

step1.title: Sign up as a host
step1.description: List your property in 5 minutes on Studioz
step1.detail1: Create your listing with basic info like price, photos and features
step1.detail2: Click 'Publish' and start receiving booking requests

step2.title: Receive bookings from renters
step2.description: Accept the sessions you want to host, decline the ones you don't.
step2.detail1: Your address and contact info are always kept private
step2.detail2: Renters will message you through Studioz with questions and booking requests
step2.detail3: You can schedule location scouts and negotiate timings for setup and teardown

step3.title: Host a session - Get paid
step3.description: Earn extra income with complete peace of mind
step3.detail1: If you don't want to be present, Studioz can provide support
step3.detail2: Renters are charged as soon as you accept their booking request
step3.detail3: Final payout is deposited into your preferred bank account within 7 days

security.title: Secure & Protected
security.description: All renters are verified professionals. Your property is protected with comprehensive insurance coverage for every booking.

payment.title: Fast Payments
payment.description: Get paid quickly and securely. Payments are processed automatically and deposited directly to your account.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our dedicated support team is always available to help you with any questions or issues that may arise.

earnings.title: Maximize Earnings
earnings.description: Set your own rates and availability. You're in complete control of your pricing and schedule.
